name: accessibility-linter
description: Accessibility test a web page or web application

scripts.uglify:standalone: uglifyjs build/linter.js --source-map content=inline,url=inline | exorcist build/linter.min.js.map > build/linter.min.js
scripts.uglify:umd: uglifyjs build/umd.js --source-map content=inline,url=inline | exorcist build/umd.min.js.map > build/umd.min.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run mkbuild && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:all: npm run build:standalone && npm run build:umd
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master -X theirs && npm run build && echo "!**" > build/.gitignore && git add -A && git commit -m "merge master and latest build" && git push && git checkout master
scripts.prebuild: npm run mkbuild && npm run clean && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run uglify:standalone && npm run uglify:umd
scripts.watch: npm run start & watch 'npm run build:dev' lib

author: Daniel Lewis
